subject: Soccer
Race
Discrimination
lead_paragraph: Oguchi Onyewu, who plays for the Belgian club Standard Liege, said that an Anderlecht player called him a monkey and made other inflammatory remarks during a match on May 21.
snippet: Oguchi Onyewu, who plays for the Belgian club Standard Liege, said that an Anderlecht player called him a monkey and made other inflammatory remarks during a match on May 21.
